entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
